about_the_game:
Verdant Realms invites you into a rich, customizable world where the beauty of nature enhances every aspect of the game. This expansion pack brings the tranquil essence of verdant forests and towering mountains right to your screen, offering an immersive puzzle-solving experience like no other. Customize your gameplay with an array of dynamic design elements tailored to nature lovers. Choose from a variety of serene menu backgrounds depicting lush landscapes, and set the tone with calming music that echoes the peacefulness of the wilderness.

The DLC doesn't stop at aesthetics; it enriches the game with new, challenging puzzles themed around the beauty of the natural world, from intricate forest patterns to majestic mountain vistas. With "Verdant Realms," your creativity is the limit. Mix and match different mouse cursors, text fonts, and menu designs to create a gaming environment that’s uniquely yours. Activate or deactivate these elements at any time to suit your mood or gameplay style.
